summarized_tuple: Riccardo is 26 years old and works as a PhD student.
Riccardo prefers sightseeing and visiting multiple attractions during vacations.
Riccardo prefers no particular mode over others for travel.
Riccardo prefers unique experiences over familiar European destinations.
Riccardo enjoys spontaneous trips and variety over planned ones.
Riccardo finds it challenging to travel internationally currently.
